C

classLoaders() - Method in class ExtensionManager
 
clear() - Method in class ExtensionManager
Clear any cached or referenced extension instances.

E

Extension - Annotation Type in jext
This annotation allows to mark a class as an extension managed by the ExtensionManager.
ExtensionLoader - Interface in jext
This interface allows third-party contributors to implement custom mechanisms to retrieve extension instances, instead of using the Java ServiceLoader approach.
ExtensionManager - Class in jext
Object that provides operations in order to retrieve instances of classes annotated with Extension.
ExtensionManager() - Constructor for class ExtensionManager
Creates a new extension manager using the default class loader of the current thread
ExtensionManager(ClassLoader...) - Constructor for class ExtensionManager
Creates a new extension manager restricted to a specific set of class loaders
ExtensionManager(Collection<ClassLoader>) - Constructor for class ExtensionManager
Creates a new extension manager restricted to a specific set of class loaders
extensionPoint() - Method in annotation type Extension
The class name of the extension point that is extended.
ExtensionPoint - Annotation Type in jext
This annotation allows to mark an interface or abstract class as an extension point managed by the ExtensionManager.
extensionPointVersion() - Method in annotation type Extension
The minimum version of the extension point that is extended in form of <majorVersion>.<minorVersion> .
ExtensionProcessor - Class in jext
An extension processor that validate and publish the provided extensions
ExtensionProcessor() - Constructor for class ExtensionProcessor
 
ExtensionScope - Enum in jext
The different strategies that can be used each time an extension is requested using the ExtensionManager.
externallyManaged() - Method in annotation type Extension
Extensions marked as externally managed will not resolved using the ServiceLoader mechanism.

G

getExtension(Class<T>) - Method in class ExtensionManager
Retrieves an instance for the given extension point, if any exists.
getExtensionMetadata(Class<T>) - Method in class ExtensionManager
Get all the extension annotated metadata for a given extension point
getExtensionMetadata(T) - Method in class ExtensionManager
Get the extension annotated metadata for a given extension
getExtensions(Class<T>) - Method in class ExtensionManager
Retrieves a priority-ordered list with all extensions for the given extension point.
getExtensionsThatSatisfy(Class<T>, Predicate<T>) - Method in class ExtensionManager
Retrieves a priority-ordered list with all then extensions for the given extension point that satisfies the specified condition.
getExtensionsThatSatisfyMetadata(Class<T>, Predicate<Extension>) - Method in class ExtensionManager
Retrieves a priority-ordered list with all then extensions for the given extension point that satisfies the specified condition.
getExtensionThatSatisfy(Class<T>, Predicate<T>) - Method in class ExtensionManager
Retrieves the instance for the given extension point that satisfies the specified condition, if any exists.
getExtensionThatSatisfyMetadata(Class<T>, String, String, String) - Method in class ExtensionManager
Retrieves the instance for the given extension point that satisfies the given provider, name and version, if any exists.
getExtensionThatSatisfyMetadata(Class<T>, Predicate<Extension>) - Method in class ExtensionManager
Retrieves the instance for the given extension point that satisfies the specified condition, if any exists.
GLOBAL - ExtensionScope
Keep a single instance

I

invalidateSession(String) - Method in interface ExtensionLoader
Invalidate the given session, removing possible stored data from cache.

J

jext - module jext
This modules allows you to define a plug-in architecture detecting the Java classes that implements a specific interface.
jext - package jext
 

L

load(Class<T>, List<ClassLoader>, String) - Method in interface ExtensionLoader
Given a expected type and a class loader, retrieves a collection of instances of the type.
LOCAL - ExtensionScope
Create a new instance each time

N

name() - Method in annotation type Extension
The name of the extension
newSession() - Method in class ExtensionManager
Creates a new session of the extension manager.
NORMAL_PRORITY - Static variable in annotation type Extension
 

O

overridable() - Method in annotation type Extension
Defines whether or not this extension can be overridden by other extension that extends the implementation.
overrides() - Method in annotation type Extension
The qualified class name of another extension that should be replaced by this extension in case both of them are valid alternatives.

P

priority() - Method in annotation type Extension
Priority used when extensions collide, the highest value have priority over others.
process(Set<? extends TypeElement>, RoundEnvironment) - Method in class ExtensionProcessor
 
provider() - Method in annotation type Extension
The provider (organization, package, group, etc.) of the extension

S

scope() - Method in annotation type Extension
Scope where this extension should be instantiated
SESSION - ExtensionScope
Keep a single instance per session

V

valueOf(String) - Static method in enum ExtensionScope
Returns the enum constant of this type with the specified name.
values() - Static method in enum ExtensionScope
Returns an array containing the constants of this enum type, in the order they are declared.
version() - Method in annotation type Extension
The version of the extension in form of <majorVersion>.<minorVersion>.<patch>
version() - Method in annotation type ExtensionPoint
The version of the extension point in form of <majorVersion>.<minorVersion>
